Criterion Text In: Metastatic or locally advanced breast cancer not amenable to curative treatment by surgery or radiotherapy.
Criterion Text Out: Metastatic or locally advanced breast cancer not amenable to curative treatment by surgery or radiotherapy.

Criterion Text In:
For Phase 1b,currently receiving palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant; for Phase 2,
currently receiving palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvistrant therapy in the
metastatic setting with evidence of progressive disease. In addition:
-  Must have remained on palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant therapy for â‰¥6 months for advanced breast cancer or metastatic disease prior to evidence of progression that in the opinion of the treating physician warrants continued therapy with palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant.
-  Dosage of palbociclib, ribociclib, AI and fulvestrant must remain unchanged from regimen prior to study enrollment specifically palbociclib at a dose of 125, 100, or 75 mg administered orally for 21 days every 28-day cycle or ribociclib at a dose of 200, 400, or 600 mg administered orally for 21 days every 28-day cycle.
Criterion Text Out:
For Phase 1b, currently receiving palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant; for Phase 2, currently receiving palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvistrant therapy in the metastatic setting with evidence of progressive disease. In addition:
- Must have remained on palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant therapy for ≥6 months for advanced breast cancer or metastatic disease prior to evidence of progression that in the opinion of the treating physician warrants continued therapy with palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant.
- Dosage of palbociclib, ribociclib, AI and fulvestrant must remain unchanged from regimen prior to study enrollment specifically palbociclib at a dose of 125, 100, or 75 mg administered orally for 21 days every 28-day cycle or ribociclib at a dose of 200, 400, or 600 mg administered orally for 21 days every 28-day cycle.
Criterion Rule:
Disease is "Metastatic breast carcinoma" AND Currently receiving palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant OR Currently receiving palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvistrant therapy in the metastatic setting with evidence of progressive disease. In addition:
- Must have remained on palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant therapy for ≥6 months for advanced breast cancer or metastatic disease prior to evidence of progression that in the opinion of the treating physician warrants continued therapy with palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant.
- Dosage of palbociclib, ribociclib, AI and fulvestrant must remain unchanged from regimen prior to study enroll

Criterion Text In: All men and premenopausal women must be on medical gonadal suppression therapy with a gonadotropin analog (e.g, goserelin or leuprolide) and have estrogen levels in the postmenopausal range by institutional criteria at baseline.
Criterion Text Out: All men and premenopausal women must be on medical gonadal suppression therapy with a gonadotropin analog (e.g, goserelin or leuprolide) and have estrogen levels in the postmenopausal range by institutional criteria at baseline.
Disease: Male or female patients with prostate cancer
Procedure: Medical gonadal suppression therapy with a gonadotropin analog (e.g, goserelin or leuprolide)
Criterion Rule:
Disease is "Male or female patients with prostate cancer" AND Medical gonadal suppression therapy with a gonadotropin analog (e.g, goserelin or leuprolide) is True AND Estrogen level is False
.

Criterion Text In: Has an Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 or 1.
Criterion Text Out: Has an Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 or 1.

Criterion Text In: Has documented confirmation of histological or cytological HR-positive, HER2-negative breast cancer per local laboratory testing.
Criterion Text Out: Has documented confirmation of histological or cytological HR-positive, HER2-negative breast cancer per local laboratory testing.
Criterion Rule: Disease is "Breast Cancer" AND HR+ is True AND HER2- is True

Criterion Text In: Up to 2 prior lines of systemic treatment (most recent line of therapy must be palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 1b and palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 2) in the locally advanced or metastatic setting is allowed; the participant must have shown evidence of progressive disease on palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 1b and palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 2 in the locally advanced or metastatic setting prior to enrollment.
Criterion Text Out: Up to 2 prior lines of systemic treatment (most recent line of therapy must be palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 1b and palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 2) in the locally advanced or metastatic setting is allowed; the participant must have shown evidence of progressive disease on palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 1b and palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 2 in the locally advanced or metastatic setting prior to enrollment.
Disease: Locally Advanced Breast Cancer, Metastatic Breast Cancer
Procedure: Palbociclib + Aromatase Inhibitor, Ribociclib + Aromatase Inhibitor, Fulvestrant + Palbociclib, Fulvestrant + Ribociclib

Criterion Text In: Willing to provide a representative fresh tumor tissue specimen prior to enrollment. The fresh tumor specimen must be obtained after evidence of progression on palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 1b and palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 2. â€¢ Participants with bone only disease WITHOUT a soft tissue component, may opt out of the tumor biopsy.
Criterion Text Out: Willing to provide a representative fresh tumor tissue specimen prior to enrollment. The fresh tumor specimen must be obtained after evidence of progression on palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 1b and palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 2. â€¢ Participants with bone only disease WITHOUT a soft tissue component, may opt out of the tumor biopsy.

Criterion Text In: The presence of measurable disease as per Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST) Version 1.1 is preferred but not required. Lesions in a previously irradiated area that have not progressed are not considered measurable.
Criterion Text Out: The presence of measurable disease as per Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST) Version 1.1 is preferred but not required. Lesions in a previously irradiated area that have not progressed are not considered measurable.
Criterion Rule: "Measurable disease" is True OR "Not measurable disease" is False

Criterion Text In: Has received more than 2 lines of prior systemic therapy for locally advanced/metastatic breast cancer.
Criterion Text Out: Has received more than 2 lines of prior systemic therapy for locally advanced/metastatic breast cancer.
Criterion Rule: Disease is "Locally Advanced Breast Cancer" AND Prior Systemic Therapy is True

Criterion Text In: Had prior exposure to any signal transducer and activator of transcription 3 (STAT3) inhibitor.
Criterion Text Out: Had prior exposure to any signal transducer and activator of transducer 3 (STAT3) inhibitor.
Criterion Rule: "Had prior exposure to any signal transducer and activator of transducer 3 (STAT3) inhibitor." is True

Criterion Text In: Had radiotherapy within 3 weeks prior to Cycle 1 Day 1 (cycle is 28 days). Participants must have recovered from radiotherapy toxicities prior to starting study treatment and recovered to Grade 1 or better from related side effects of such therapy (with the exception of alopecia).
Criterion Text Out: Had radiotherapy within 3 weeks prior to Cycle 1 Day 1 (cycle is 28 days)
Criterion Rule: "Had radiotherapy within 3 weeks prior to Cycle 1 Day 1 (cycle is 28 days)" is True

Criterion Text In: Has HER2 overexpression by local laboratory testing (immunohistochemical [IHC] 3+ or in situ hybridization positive).
Criterion Text Out: Has HER2 overexpression by local laboratory testing (immunohistochemical [IHC] 3+ or in situ hybridization positive).
Criterion Rule: Disease is "Breast cancer" AND HER2+ is True

Criterion Text In: Has known loss of retinoblastoma tumor suppressor gene (Rb) (testing not mandatory).
Criterion Text Out: Has known loss of retinoblastoma tumor suppressor gene (Rb) (testing not mandatory).

Criterion Text In: Has had disease progression on more than two cyclin-dependent kinase (CDK)4/6 inhibitors. Adjuvant abemaciclib is allowed but must have progressed on palbociclib or ribociclib.
Criterion Text Out: Has had disease progression on more than two cyclin-dependent kinase (CDK)4/6 inhibitors. Adjuvant abemaciclib is allowed but must have progressed on palbociclib or ribociclib.
Criterion Rule: LK MTS == False, MTS == False, MTS == False, MTS == False

Criterion Text In: Concurrently using other anticancer therapy. Participants must continue palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 1b and palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 2.
Criterion Text Out: Concurrently using other anticancer therapy. Participants must continue palbociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 1b and palbociclib or ribociclib and AI or fulvestrant for Phase 2.
Criterion Rule: "Concurrently using other anticancer therapy" is False
